about_the_game:
Happy Thanksgiving! Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers is the latest in a series of all-new games inspired by classic '80s arcade vibes.

The ravenous Buffetlians from the planet Divowrr travel the galaxy in search of savory delights — and they've finally set their sights on Earth! But instead of eating the populace, they're curious to participate in the exotic culinary ritual they assume was named for them: "the buffet." Attracted to the bright lights of Las Vegas but lacking the social graces (and opposable thumbs) of the local populace, the Buffetlians expect to be served immediately upon their arrival — and if they don't get the food they crave, they'll start snacking straight from the buffet itself! Can you assemble all the plates and deliver all the meals before your uninvited guests destroy the dining room?

Instructions

  • Prepare plates of food based on the aliens' orders
  • Fling dishes to feed the aliens
  • Restock the buffets by grabbing power-ups
  • The aliens are toxic — don't touch them!
  • Stop the aliens from attacking the buffets

Gameplay Hints

  • Red Buffetlians are particularly poor dinner guests and will frequently launch energy projectiles at you. Dodge their shots — and serve them first!
  • If you load up an entire meal onto one dish, you'll receive a bonus upon delivery of the Combo Plate. It might be less lucrative to deliver the food one item at a time, but it's safer. Consider your strategy carefully.
  • There's no penalty for delivering more food items than the aliens are craving.

Game Controls

  • Move/Aim: Joystick
  • Grab Food/Launch Plate: Button

Additional Options

  • F1 toggles CRT scanlines on/off
  • F2 toggles CRT curvature on/off
  • F3 switches resolution in windowed mode
  • F9 resets the game
  • Alt-Enter toggles between 16:9 fullscreen and 4:3 windowed mode
  • + and - adjusts audio volume

About Digital Eclipse Arcade


A series of throwback games made for the Digital Eclipse community, Digital Eclipse Arcade is a celebration of pure arcade gameplay. We periodically post betas of our games for early feedback. Please visit us at for more info.

short_description: Rude aliens have arrived to sample Earth's legendary all-you-can-eat buffet, and they're sending a smorgasboarding party down to YOUR dining room. Can you assemble and deliver their plates of food before the aliens wreck the restaurant?
